name: LAWS70821
tagline: Introduction to Statistics and Data Analysis
body:
### Welcome to the GitHub Pages for LAWS70821
This is the GitHub page where the handouts and data for Introduction and Data Analysis (MRes Criminology) are stored.

### Sessions
* [Week 1: Introduction to R](https://rawgit.com/jjmedinaariza/LAWS70821/master/Week_1_Introduction.html)
* [Week 2: Graphics with ggplot2](https://rawgit.com/jjmedinaariza/LAWS70821/master/Week_2_Graphics.html)
* [Week 3 Foundations for inference (confidence intervals)](https://rawgit.comhttps://raw.githubusercontent.com/jjmedinaariza/LAWS70821/master/Week_3_Foundations.html)
* [Week 4: Hypothesis tests (comparing means)](https://rawgit.comhttps://raw.githubusercontent.com/jjmedinaariza/LAWS70821/master/Week_4_Hypothesis_testing.html)
* [Week 5: Relationships between two factors](https://rawgit.com/jjmedinaariza/LAWS70821/master/Week_5_Crosstabs.html)
* Week 6: Linear regression
* Week 7: Logistic regression
* Week 8: Regression in the real world

### Course Outline

### Support or Contact
Having trouble or questions? Please email juanjo.medina@manchester.ac.uk
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
